alert.note: Alert for Lyon; Marshall (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 6:55AM EDT until July 19 at 7:15AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR CENTRAL MARSHALL AND SOUTHWESTERN LYON COUNTIES... At 554 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Birmingham Ferry Recreation Area, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained Spotters reported 1.25 inch hail in Grand Rivers at 550 AM. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Benton, Birmingham Ferry Recreation Area, Hillman Ferry Campground and Land Between The Lakes Area. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky near Mile Marker 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
